name: Full-Stack Engineering
description: Expertise in designing and implementing end-to-end web applications, seamlessly integrating frontend and backend technologies for scalable and maintainable solutions.

name: Cloud Solutions (AWS, Azure)
description: Skilled in deploying, managing, and optimizing cloud-based infrastructures, ensuring high availability, security, and cost efficiency.

name: API Architecture
description: Experienced in designing robust, secure, and performant APIs that enable seamless communication between services and systems.

name: Agile Delivery
description: Proven ability to lead and contribute to Agile teams, delivering iterative, high-quality software on time while adapting to evolving requirements.

name: Technical Leadership
description: Adept at guiding development teams, mentoring engineers, and driving technical strategy to align with business goals.
